hero.description: New level of interaction in the gaming community

ideology.description: Hold CHICS — play with the girls
ideology.toolDescription: A convenient tool for gamers to interact with popular female streamers

cardtokenomics.emission: Emission of 1 billion CHICS, 55% for developers and pre-seed investors, 45% on the open market
cardtokenomics.volume: 70% of the developers' coin volume is frozen until the end of 2025
cardtokenomics.marketing: 30% is allocated for marketing and promotion in the crypto community
cardtokenomics.voting: Key decisions are made through open community voting
cardtokenomics.mining: GPU mining launch upon reaching a market cap of $10 million

concept.title: Concept Development
concept.description: Formation of an experienced team of developers and marketers, creation of an active community, attraction of first investors, launch and support of social networks and media platforms.

start.title: Project Launch
start.description: Presale on the Blum memepad (TON network) followed by listing on DEX platforms, active marketing in thematic groups, attraction of female ambassadors, conducting broadcasts and first joint matches.

integration.title: Integration and Scaling
integration.description: Development of a cross-platform application (iOS, Android, TMA) for participating in matches (CS2, Dota, WoT, etc.) with streamers. Listing on Xeggex, MEXC, and Tier-1 exchanges. Integration with FaceIT, FastCup.

contests.title: International Competitions
contests.description: Organization of tournaments among female streamers (CS2, Dota, FIFA, WoT) supported by CHICS with coverage in major media.

distribution.title: CHICS Emission Distribution (1 billion CHICS)
distribution.frozenUntil2025: 70% of the developers' tokens are frozen until the end of 2025
distribution.marketingAndCommunity: 30% allocated for marketing and promotion within the crypto community

privacy.intro_text: At ChicsCoin, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting any information you may share with us. This Privacy Policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding that information.
privacy.data_collection_text: We do not collect any personally identifiable information from users when using the ChicsCoin app, except where explicitly required for specific features (which will be clearly indicated).
privacy.embedded_browser_text: This app uses an embedded browser (WebView) to display external content. We do not collect cookies, tracking data, or any user information through this feature.
privacy.use_of_data_text: If you voluntarily provide any data (e.g., when contacting support), it will only be used for the following purposes: Responding to your inquiries; Supporting the app’s functionality; Improving the user experience (if applicable). We do not sell or share your data with third parties.
privacy.security_text: We take reasonable measures to protect any information you provide against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
privacy.third_party_content_text: The app may contain links to or display content from external websites. We do not control the privacy practices or content of these third-party sites and recommend reviewing their respective privacy policies.
privacy.changes_to_policy_text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be communicated through the app or by other appropriate means, in accordance with applicable laws.
privacy.contact_info_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us at: Email: chicscoin@gmail.com
